attributes.action: Mandate councils to find accommodation for the homeless
attributes.background: The Government has recently told councils to provide housing to the homeless due to the current COVID-19 pandemic. If the Government believes that councils have the resources to do this during these difficult times, what is to stop them making this official government policy in normal times too?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302485

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
